verbose_text: Imiquimod 5% cream acts as a topical immune response modifier promoting a Th-1 immune response enhancing the removal of neoplastic cells and has proven to reduce deregulated Hedgehog (HH)/GLI signal strength independent of Toll like receptor signaling, which makes it a valuable adjuvant topical therapy for the treatment of basal cell carcinoma.
